subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball (College)
organizations: State University of New York at Buffalo
lead_paragraph: The University at Buffalo hired Bobby Hurley as its men’s basketball coach, taking over for Reggie Witherspoon, who was fired two weeks ago after 14 seasons.
snippet: The University at Buffalo hired Bobby Hurley as its men’s basketball coach, taking over for Reggie Witherspoon, who was fired two weeks ago after 14 seasons.
